page.title: 18A CHILD'S DAY IN CLITHEROE
page.content: My day usually starts at 8.00 a.m. I go downstairs and have my breakfast, then get dressed ready for school. My mum comes downstairs after me and makes my packed_lunch. I get my bags ready. Today is Thursday so I do not need anything special. When I get to school me and three other girls have to line up the infants and send them in. There is no assembly this morning so we get on with our work straight away. We usually do S.M.P. in the morning. At 10.00 a.m. we have our music lesson then we go out to play. Straight after dinner we have assembly, we usually have a radio programme. After school I go to the Music Centre this finishes at 6.00 p.m. When I get home I have my tea then play out for a while. Usually I watch Top of the Pops then get ready for bed.
